alert.note: Alert for Adair; Linn; Livingston; Macon; Putnam; Schuyler; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:44AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Adair, Linn, Sullivan, Putnam, western Schuyler, northwestern Macon and northeastern Livingston Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 444 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Unionville to near Milan to 7 miles northwest of Wheeling. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brookfield, Milan, Unionville, Green City, Meadville, Novinger, Laclede, Linneus, Greencastle, Wheeling, Browning, Purdin, Pollock, Worthington, Livonia, Powersville, New Boston, Winigan, Reger and Lemons. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Linn; Livingston; Macon; Putnam; Schuyler; Sullivan
